attractions.name: Harvest Park Event Center
attractions.description: A premier event venue featuring beautiful indoor and outdoor spaces perfect for weddings, corporate events, and community gatherings. The center offers stunning mountain views and professional event coordination services.

attractions.name: Whiting Campground
attractions.description: A scenic mountain campground nestled in Mapleton Canyon, offering tent and RV sites surrounded by towering trees and mountain streams. Perfect for family camping, hiking, and enjoying Utah's natural beauty.

attractions.name: Mapleton Canyon
attractions.description: A breathtaking canyon offering hiking trails, fishing opportunities, and spectacular views of the Wasatch Mountains. Popular activities include rock climbing, photography, and wildlife viewing in this natural paradise.

attractions.name: Eagle Rock Disc Golf Course
attractions.description: An 18-hole championship disc golf course featuring challenging terrain and beautiful mountain backdrop. The course welcomes players of all skill levels and hosts regular tournaments and community events.

attractions.name: Ira Allan Park
attractions.description: A family-friendly community park featuring playgrounds, picnic areas, walking trails, and sports facilities. The park includes basketball courts, tennis courts, and open green spaces for recreation and community events.

attractions.name: Mapleton City Park
attractions.address: W Maple St & N Main St, Mapleton, UT 84664
attractions.description: The heart of Mapleton's recreational activities, featuring well-maintained facilities for baseball, soccer, and community gatherings. The park hosts annual festivals and provides a central meeting place for residents.

attractions.name: Mapleton Historical Society Museum
attractions.description: Preserving Mapleton's rich heritage through exhibits showcasing local history, pioneer artifacts, and community stories. The museum offers guided tours and educational programs about the area's founding and development.

attractions.name: Mapleton City Cemetery
attractions.description: A peaceful and well-maintained cemetery serving the Mapleton community since the early settlement days. The grounds feature beautiful landscaping and historical markers telling the stories of Mapleton's founding families.
